meta.description: Is the COVID-19 vaccine the mark of the beast? Should Christians not get any of the COVID-19 vaccines due to their connection to abortion? Why should grace and deference be the rule in our conversations about the COVID-19 vaccine?

title: Should a Christian get a COVID-19 vaccine?
cleaned_text: Is the COVID-19 vaccine the mark of the beast? Should Christians not get any of the COVID-19 vaccines due to their connection to abortion? Why should grace and deference be the rule in our conversations about the COVID-19 vaccine?Audio:Disclaimer: The views expressed by guests on our podcast do not necessarily reflect the views of Got Questions Ministries. Please use biblically-informed discernment in evaluating what is said on our podcast.
